page.title: 07Sarah's Day in Heolgerrig.
page.content: At 7.30 I get up to watch Breakfast T.V. for half an hour. I have a breakfast of cornflakes and orange juice, after I run upstairs to dress. My mother who teaches at Pen y Dre Comprehensive School drives me to school on her way to work. I go to Heolgerrig Primary School. Lessons start at 09.00 and finish at 15.30. I walk home and arrive at about 15.45. As soon as I get home I do my homework then watch TV for half an hour. I play the flute and violin and that takes up at least two and a half hours of my time each day. When I have finished I watch TV for the remainder of the night until 21.30 and that's when I go to bed.
